episodes.title: AJ & JOHNNY - THE ART OF CHARM - TOO RISQUE FOR RADIO
episodes.description: On this episode of Too Risqué for Radio: What is the key to approaching potential dates? Well, AJ and Johnny of the Art of Charm stop by to give their tips and tricks to never feeling awkward around people! They explain what the difference between cocky and confidence is. Plus, learn about dating, connecting, how to make good impressions and how to gain confidence in your social skills. Check it all out right here!
